blogPost.excerpt: Clubhouse Clone code built on React Native with Backend and Custom Microservices Architecture for Audio Conference which is Capable of Creating Truly Huge Rooms for Thousands of Listeners
blogPost.body: Clubhouse Clone code built on React Native with Backend and Custom Microservices Architecture for Audio Conference which is Capable of Creating Truly Huge Rooms for Thousands of Listeners
blogPost.title: Clubrooms - Clubhouse clone for Android and iOS
blogPost.author: Artem Bogoslavskiy

localize.description: 基于React Native构建的Clubhouse Clone代码，带有后端和自定义微服务架构的音频会议，能够为数千名听众创建真正的巨大房间。
基於React Native構建的Clubhouse Clone代碼，帶有後端和自定義微服務架構的音頻會議，能夠爲數千名聽衆創建真正的巨大房間。

previous.excerpt: Post.co is the best way to share big and small news across your team. Designed as a substitute for messy threads and awkward reply-all team emails, Post is a simple, low-stakes way to share team-wide updates. Great for remote teams to stay connected.
previous.title: Post - The simplest way to post big or small news across your team.

localize.description: Post.co是在您的团队中分享大小新闻的最佳方式。Post.co是一种简单的、低风险的分享团队更新的方式，它的设计可以替代混乱的线程和尴尬的团队邮件回复。非常适合远程团队保持联系。
localize.tagline: 最简单的方式在你的团队中发布大大小小的新闻。

localize.description: Post.co是在您的團隊中分享大小新聞的最佳方式。Post.co是一種簡單的、低風險的分享團隊更新的方式，它的設計可以替代混亂的線程和尷尬的團隊郵件回覆。非常適合遠程團隊保持聯繫。
localize.tagline: 最簡單的方式在你的團隊中發佈大大小小的新聞。

next.excerpt: Generate high quality tweets for the lazy weekends when you're out of tweet ideas. Jokes, Quotes, shower thoughts, facts and LPTs, all for free🔥 Comes with inbuilt button to fire up a canva canvas and tweet beautiful graphics fast! Enjoy!
next.title: Tweet Ideas - Never run out of tweets again with this content generator

localize.description: 在懒散的周末，当你没有了推文创意时，生成高质量的推文。笑话、名言、想法、事实和LPTs，全部免费🔥内嵌按钮，启动canva画布，快速生成漂亮的图文。享受吧
localize.tagline: 有了这个内容生成器，永远不会再没有推文了。

localize.description: 在懶散的週末，當你沒有了推文創意時，生成高質量的推文。笑話、名言、想法、事實和LPTs，全部免費🔥內嵌按鈕，啓動canva畫布，快速生成漂亮的圖文。享受吧
localize.tagline: 有了這個內容生成器，永遠不會再沒有推文了。
